page.title: 17 WORK IN GORDON.
page.content: My dad works as a engineer.He works in and around Gordon.He works in a very special shed.Sometimes he sorts cars or sprays cars.He often puts car engines into peoples cars. He has a very good job as an engineer. He does lots of jobs in the village for people.They all like my dad. My dad likes his work very much because it makes him money.When he comes in from work he is very tired. My dad has a lot of expensive stuff. He has a spray gun and a compressor. He uses them a lot in his work.A spray gun costs about one hundred pounds.The compresser blows the paint out of the spray gun on to the car.My dad has worked as an engineer for over 6 years.
